text: @SpeakerPelosi How much more Oversight is needed? Within the passage of #CARESAct, 3 oversight boards exist w/IG's on place and appointments made by you. This is another #WitchHunt You people are mentally sick to try and pull this BS at this time of crisis #COVID19 @kilmeade @realDonaldTrump
